author: Odeinoichus
title: An OK Blister Carded set from 2016.
review:
Set #853556 Friends Mini-Doll Campsite Set: This is a LEGO store exclusive with three mini-dolls and some mini models to build in a unique package. It doesn’t seem to have sold very well as it was put on sale after a while, which is unfortunate because the mini-dolls were pretty unique and fun looking.

Packaging

This was a blister packed set, similar to the LEGO Batman Movie and NEXO Knights Battle Packs, basically this was the Friends equivalent to a battle pack and it looked great inside the packaging. The three mini-dolls pop vibrantly when seen with the background Heartlake Forest artwork. A decent enough package design.

Minidolls

Kate: This is the second version of this Friend that I own, and as Mini-Dolls go she’s really rather nice. Dressed in a nice airy summer outfit she has an orange skirt with a strap-sleeved yellow and orange striped top. Nice parts combo.

Liza: The first version of this Friend I got was from one of the Advent Calendars. Her design here is a bit of a weaker one, she’s using the green pair of pants that Mia loves to wear and her rich dark purple hoodie thing does not match with it very well. It’s nice for summer adventures camping though.

Maya: This is the first Maya I’ve gotten and her outfit looks fine, it’s a matching bluish-grey skirt with a tied outer vest and a pink shirt underneath it. Her design is one of the stronger looking combos for Mini-Doll outfit parts and colours and she and Kate make the best Minidolls from this set.

The Mini Builds

There isn’t much to build in this set, but they are fun looking little models to play with next to the Minidolls. You get a small table with three clear pink coffee mugs and a very low to the ground barbecue pit with some ketchup and mustard containers next to them.

There really isn’t much to say here, the builds are very minimal and use few parts, but they do work with the Minidolls to offer some fun play value in the package.

Overall opinion

I enjoyed this set, it wasn’t something I was expecting, but it was definitely fun and includes a lot of great items to play with. It’s price was a bit high, so getting it on sale was definitely a better deal. I’d strongly recommend tracking it down before it’s sold out, as it is still available in some areas.
